mapper.insert: insert into chart(no, mem_id, chartname, charttype, label, data, createtime) values('chart_'||seq_chart_no.nextval, #{mem_id}, #{chartname}, #{charttype}, #{label}, #{data}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))
mapper.select: select no, mem_id, chartname, charttype, label, data, createtime from chart where mem_id = #{mem_id} order by no desc
mapper.update: update chart set label = #{label}, data = #{data} where no = #{no}
